mapper.select: select user_id ,user_nick ,user_name ,user_email ,user_tel ,user_addr ,user_level ,user_bs_no ,user_bs_type ,user_bs_status ,user_bs_name ,user_url ,user_date ,user_q ,user_a from user where user_id = #{userId} ;
select style.style_value from user join user_style on user.user_id = user_style.user_id join style on style.style_no = user_style.style_no where user_style.user_id = #{userId} ;
select color.color_value from user join user_color on user.user_id = user_color.user_id join color on color.color_no = user_color.color_no where user_color.user_id = #{userId} ;

select user_id ,user_nick ,user_name ,user_gender ,user_email ,user_tel ,user_addr ,user_age ,user_tall ,user_size ,user_level ,user_date ,user_q ,user_a ,user_img from user where user_id = #{userId} ;
